location.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚苏门答腊北部亚齐特区外海
location.en: Off the west coast of northern Sumatra, Indonesia

description.zh-cn: 一场发生于印度尼西亚苏门答腊外海的海底地震，引发了大规模海啸，重创印度洋沿岸14个国家，是21世纪最致命的自然灾害之一。
description.en: An undersea earthquake that occurred off the coast of Sumatra, Indonesia, triggering a massive tsunami that devastated 14 countries along the Indian Ocean coast, becoming one of the deadliest natural disasters of the 21st century.

description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚的跨大陆国家，是2004年印度洋大地震及海啸中受灾最严重的国家。
description.en: A transcontinental country in Southeast Asia, which was the country most severely affected by the 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake and tsunami.

description.zh-cn: 位于印度洋的岛国，在2004年印度洋海啸中遭受了严重的人员伤亡和经济损失。
description.en: An island country in the Indian Ocean that suffered severe casualties and economic losses in the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

description.zh-cn: 南亚国家，其东南部沿海地区及安达曼-尼科巴群岛在2004年印度洋海啸中受灾严重。
description.en: A South Asian country whose southeastern coastal areas and the Andaman and Nicobar Islands were severely affected by the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚国家，其南部安达曼海岸的旅游区在2004年印度洋海啸中遭受重创。
description.en: A Southeast Asian country whose tourist areas on the southern Andaman coast were devastated by the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

description.zh-cn: 泰国国王拉玛九世的外孙，在2004年印度洋海啸中不幸遇难。
description.en: Grandson of King Bhumibol Adulyadej of Thailand, who tragically died in the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

description.zh-cn: 泰国却克里王朝第九位君主，其外孙蒲美·詹森在2004年印度洋海啸中遇难。
description.en: The ninth monarch of Thailand from the Chakri dynasty, whose grandson Bhumi Jensen died in the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

en: Humanitarian response to the 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake

description.zh-cn: 为应对2004年印度洋大地震及海啸而展开的全球性人道救援行动，是历史上规模最大的人道救援行动之一。
description.en: The global humanitarian effort launched in response to the 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake and tsunami, one of the largest humanitarian responses in history.

description.zh-cn: 全球性的国际组织，在2004年印度洋海啸后协调并展开了大规模的跨国救灾行动。
description.en: A global intergovernmental organization that coordinated and launched a large-scale multinational disaster relief operation after the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

description.zh-cn: 德国一级方程式赛车手，为2004年印度洋海啸的救援工作捐赠了1000万美元。
description.en: A German Formula One racing driver who donated $10 million to the relief efforts for the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

description.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚政治家，在2004年印度洋大地震发生时担任印度尼西亚总统。
description.en: An Indonesian politician who served as the President of Indonesia at the time of the 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 美国位于北美洲西北角的州。2004年印度洋大地震甚至在此地触发了远距地震。
description.en: A U.S. state at the northwest extremity of North America. The 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake even triggered remote earthquakes in this region.

description.zh-cn: 美国内政部下属的科学研究机构，对2004年印度洋大地震的震级等参数进行了测定和发布。
description.en: A scientific agency of the United States Department of the Interior, which measured and reported parameters such as the magnitude of the 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 作为震中所在国，印度尼西亚是此次灾难中伤亡最惨重、损失最大的国家，特别是亚齐省遭到了毁灭性打击。
description.en: As the country where the epicenter was located, Indonesia suffered the most casualties and greatest losses in the disaster, with Aceh province being particularly devastated.

description.zh-cn: 地震引发的海啸对斯里兰卡造成了严重的人员伤亡和经济损失，导致超过4万人罹难。
description.en: The tsunami triggered by the earthquake caused severe casualties and economic losses in Sri Lanka, resulting in over 40,000 deaths.

description.zh-cn: 地震引发的海啸重创了印度东南部沿海地区及安达曼和尼科巴群岛，造成超过1万人罹难。
description.en: The tsunami triggered by the earthquake severely impacted India's southeastern coastal regions and the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, causing over 10,000 deaths.

description.zh-cn: 地震引发的海啸对泰国南部的普吉岛等旅游胜地造成了严重破坏，导致超过5000人罹难，其中约一半为外国游客。
description.en: The tsunami triggered by the earthquake caused severe damage to tourist destinations in southern Thailand, such as Phuket, resulting in over 5,000 deaths, about half of whom were foreign tourists.

description.zh-cn: 在泰国攀牙府海边的度假村划水时，被地震引发的海啸吞噬身亡。
description.en: He was killed by the tsunami triggered by the earthquake while jet-skiing at a resort on the coast of Phang Nga province, Thailand.

description.zh-cn: 蒲美·詹森是泰国国王拉玛九世的外孙。
description.en: Bhumi Jensen was the grandson of King Bhumibol Adulyadej of Thailand.

description.zh-cn: 地震和海啸造成的巨大灾难促使全球各国政府、非政府组织和民众展开了大规模的人道救援行动。
description.en: The immense devastation caused by the earthquake and tsunami prompted governments, non-governmental organizations, and individuals worldwide to launch a massive humanitarian response.

description.zh-cn: 联合国宣布展开“有史以来最大支出的一次跨国救灾行动”，并提供了8100万美元的援助，在灾后救援和重建中发挥了关键的协调作用。
description.en: The United Nations launched what it called 'the largest-ever multinational relief operation,' provided $81 million in aid, and played a key coordinating role in the post-disaster relief and reconstruction efforts.

description.zh-cn: 个人捐款1000万美元用于海啸灾区的救援工作，是当时个人捐款金额最高者之一。
description.en: Personally donated $10 million to the tsunami relief efforts, which was one of the largest individual donations at the time.

description.zh-cn: 在2004年印度洋大地震发生时担任印度尼西亚总统，他宣布全国进入国难状态，并领导了该国的救灾工作。
description.en: He was the President of Indonesia at the time of the 2004 Indian Ocean earthquake. He declared a national disaster and led the country's relief efforts.

description.zh-cn: 该地震能量巨大，甚至在遥远的阿拉斯加地区触发了远距地震。
description.en: The energy from this earthquake was so immense that it even triggered remote seismicity in the distant region of Alaska.

description.zh-cn: 对此次地震进行了监测和研究，测定其矩震级为9.1级，并发布了相关的地震数据和科学分析。
description.en: Monitored and studied this earthquake, determining its moment magnitude to be 9.1, and released related seismic data and scientific analysis.
